subject: Baseball
Trading Cards
Collectors and Collections
Hobbies
lead_paragraph: The owner of a sports card store has seen the interest in collecting baseball cards, and sales, fade from its peak period — a national trend. But some experts are predicting a turnaround.
snippet: The owner of a sports card store has seen the interest in collecting baseball cards, and sales, fade from its peak period — a national trend. But some experts are predicting a turnaround.
